Producer: Jordan Horowitz, Michael Huffington, Michael Roiff
Screenwriter: Jeffrey Brown, Egan Reich, Michael Mohan
Production Co: XYZ Films, Gilbert Films, Night & Day Pictures, Instinctive Film
Synopsis: After breaking up with her boyfriend, a bookstore manager (Lizzy Caplan) resists a seemingly perfect guy's (Mark Webber) attempts to woo her.
Title: Save the Date
